title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
